definitions.definition: A sharpening stone composed of extra-fine grit used for removing the burr or curl from the blade of a razor or some other edge tool .
A machine tool used in the manufacture of precision bores .

main_definition: A sharpening stone composed of extra-fine grit used for removing the burr or curl from the blade of a razor or some other edge tool .
secondary_definitions: A machine tool used in the manufacture of precision bores .

definitions.definition: A kind of swelling in the cheek .

main_definition: A kind of swelling in the cheek .
